item.title: About Adrienne
item.author: adrienne@example.com (Adrienne Sturgeon)
item.description:
My Journey

I’m Adrienne Sturgeon, a professional aerial silks performer with a passion for artistry, strength, and pushing the boundaries of human movement. My performances combine technical mastery with artistic expression, creating unforgettable experiences for audiences.

Background

  • Training: [Your training background and key instructors]
  • Performances: [Broadway-adjacent productions, circus festivals, corporate events, special performances]
  • Competitions: [Competition highlights and achievements]
  • Specializations: Aerial silks choreography, performance art, event performances

item.title: Get in Touch
item.author: adrienne@example.com (Adrienne Sturgeon)
item.description:
I’d love to hear from you about performance opportunities! Whether you’re looking to book aerial silks for your event, interested in a collaboration, or have questions about my work, reach out below.
